title: does pesu take admission via boards?
content:
do they take 12th board marks or overall cus in TSBIE we have 11th and 12th im scoring 99% in 12th overall and PCM agregate 100%

i asked chatgpt , he/she was like pesu does accept board merit n all and i have high chances with scholarship   
real?

comments.body: They don’t for BTech. But if you’re applying through the management quota, ig they might ask for a minimum score in your board exams
agar itne aa hi rhe he toh comedk ya Kcet me accha hi score kiya hoga
hyd se hu mae , ni diya kcet ,comedk
Afaik PES does not accept thought board marks for engineering. But you may get a discount if joining through management quota.

>i asked chatgpt , he/she was like pesu does accept board merit n all and i have high chances with scholarship

People now take counseling advice about their careers from ChatGPT huh

I said the average pesu iq was dropping. 

Nobody believed me in 2022, nobody believed me in 23, nobody in 24, please start the new school year without ignoring the truth
Not giving comedk is crazy bruh
We've been saying this for years
Shhhh, Don't tell people you don't need domicile for comedk
They ask the most retarded questions, feels like a clown show

I'm too from hyd. No, don't ask any advice from ai, they won't take through boards. I already learnt DSAs and many langs in 9, 10th, and I thought I could get cse due to those skills, not even that is accepted.
Not even COMEDK is accepted 
They only take through KCET, MAINS and Management Quota.

For [B.Tech](http://B.Tech) courses they don't, they do require some min score in boards but thats it.   
Only KCET, JEE or Management
Emotional support, counselling, academics and everything else. But tbh it told me to refer to the subreddit for more information which helped a lot when I took admission/was choosing a clg.
I would highly recommend not taking emotional support and counseling from AI.
